**WAVè½¬MP3** (å¯é€‰):

ä½¿ç”¨FFmpegæ‰¹é‡è½¬æ¢:

```powershell
# PowerShellï¼ˆWindowsï¼‰
Get-ChildItem assets\sounds\*.wav -Recurse | ForEach-Object {
    $mp3 = $_.FullName -replace '\.wav$', '.mp3'
    ffmpeg -i $_.FullName -q:a 9 $mp3
    Remove-Item $_.FullName  # åˆ é™¤WAV
}
```

```bash
# Bashï¼ˆLinux/Macï¼‰
find assets/sounds -name "*.wav" | while read wav; do
    mp3="${wav%.wav}.mp3"
    ffmpeg -i "$wav" -q:a 9 "$mp3"
    rm "$wav"
done
```
